                                                                                            spring:
  application:
    name: user-center
  profiles:
    active: dev
  cloud:
    consul:
      host: 127.0.0.1
      port: 8500
      config:
        enabled: true
        prefixes: config
        format: yml
        data-key: user-center-dtp
